name: Ankit Chiplunkar
description:
Ankit Chiplunkar

Co-founder and Head of Research at Frontier and OneBalance, Ankit specializes in breaking down complex concepts for stakeholders. Ankit fell down the crypto rabbit hole while pursuing his PhD in Aerospace Engineering and has been at Coinbase, TokenAnalyst (acq. Coinbase), Airbus and IIT Bombay. In his free time he likes to swim, read books and spend time with family.
